Name: Puzz/LR
About the game: Become the Ultimate Puzzler! Battle against the clock or others and get the top score. Game modes include: * Solo ** Basic Mode - The basic Puzz/LR experience ** Timed Mode - Watch out for falling pieces ** Jigsaw - Sit back, relax, and solve * Multiplayer modes ** Go Head-2-Head with other another Puzzler ** Play Solo vs Everybody and grab the high score on the scoreboard Features cross-platform multiplayer, play against other devices even VR!
